steps.title: Add an SSL certificate and secure your website
steps.description:
Let's secure your WordPress website with the help of the %%extlink|advisor%%.
The %%extname|advisor%% allows you to secure all your websites with SSL at one single click. Additionally, this extension lets you activate HTTP/2 for more performance on all your sites.
